name: Danza Aleteo
description: Realizas con ligereza una danza mística. Mientras dure el efecto, suma +1 a tu CA, a tus tiradas de ataque y al daño.
higherLevels: Suma +2 a tu CA al nivel 10 o superior.

effect.name: Gets the Pokémon pumped up. Helps prevent nervousness, too.
effect.effect: Doubles the Appeal Points of a successful move in the next round. Pokemon also has advantage on CHA Saving Throws until after their move next round is performed.
